li.p: Stay up to date with Alvin

div.class: inner col col24 first last idfbb4d365-1b5c-418f-a2b2-77b716a1a9d7

div.div: The FY24-25 Proposed Annual Budget was submitted to the Alvin City Council on Thursday, July 18, 2024. Read on...

The City of Alvin would like to inform all residents that the maintenance of street lights is not managed by the city. Instead, Texas-New Mexico Power (TNMP) is responsible for maintaining street lights in our community. Read on...

The 2024 Disaster Guide is prepared by Brazoria County Emergency Managers. This booklet contains vital information to assist you through hurricane season. Keep this guide readily available throughout the season. Read on...

img.alt: Photo of home with Short Term Rental wording over it

div.div: At the November 3, 2022, City Council meeting, City Council approved an ordinance (Ord 22-XX) establishing requirements and regulations for the operation of properties as Short-Term Rentals (STR) in the City of Alvin. Read on...
Sign up to receive updates and information about community news and happenings. Read on...
